headline: Residential Construction Clarity, Backed by 12+ Years on Site.
bioParagraph: I come from a small village near Kukke Subrahmanya in the foothills of the Western Ghats. I first learned construction by working as a helper whenever families in our village were building homes, then added formal technical depth through a B.Tech in Civil Engineering.
introParagraph: For the last 12 years, I have worked only in residential construction. From Sahakar Nagar, Bangalore, I work directly with families and monitor every project closely so execution stays practical, transparent, and technically sound.
